chunk:
Directions: 1. Cleanse face 2. unfold sheet mask 3. Relax for 20-30 minutes 4. Remove the sheet and enjoy your skin

Warnings: Good for all skin types but stop use if allergic reaction or skin rash occurs

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
